# 💬 Send me a note 

You can use this form to contact the Actuarial Science Laboratory for inquiries about collaborations, research opportunities, or any questions related to actuarial science.

We also appreciate your feedback on how our educational materials have helped you and how we can improve them — particularly in making them more accessible to all learners. We value your input as we continue to enhance our resources and support. {{< fa hands-helping >}}

:::
